column3: he Petitioners thereafter filed this application, seeking inter alia the following relief:
A Writ of Certiorari to quash the decision of the UGC to impose separate cut off
marks for the old syllabus and the new syllabus;
A  Writ of  Mandamus  directing the  UGC  to prepare  the  cut off  mark based  on
one single list (for both at district level and at national level);
A  Writ  of  Mandamus  directing  the  UGC  to  admit  the  Petitioners  to  a  Medical
